metadata.description: Due to problems at home regarding his future, Sora runs away to live with Tetsuya. During this time they confirm that their feelings for each other are mutual, and it naturally progresses further. But soon they find out that love isn’t the only thing they’ll need to keep their relationship going. How will these two growing young adults maintain their increasingly difficult relationship… and figure out their own unclear futures?------Translated by Neri Wesek; Edited by Chris Chiwon Woo; Lettered by Courtny Fenrich
metadata.name: Second Night of A Thousand Nights
